page.title: 13ADDERLEY VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The village hall was given to the village by Sir John Corbet. Money was raised by a trust fund.The village hall also includes the ground around it - the Green, car park and bowling green.The activities in the club are Billiards, Snooker, Darts, Table Tennis, and Pool. It is run by a village hall committee of 14 members who are responsible for the upkeep of the hall. The club has its own bar for drinks. The number of people who go there is 300. The most popular night is Friday because parties and Whist Drives are held then. Luckily Adderley has a hall. We can all meet there and have fun. I go to the Youth Club and Judo Club and we put on our school entertainments there every Christmas.
